abstract.p: Roundup of recent ad account assignments (S)

block.p: Coty U.S., New York, part of Reckitt Benckiser, to Frierson Mee & Kraft, New York, to handle the Calgon bath products account, which had been at Margeotes/Fertitta & Partners, New York, majority owned by MDC Communications. Billings were estimated at $8 million.
International Auto Parts , Jacksonville, Fla., to Cook Marketing Communications, Jacksonville, to handle its account, which had been handled in-house. Billings were estimated at $8 million.

InvestorForce.com, Wayne, Pa., an online resource for institutional investing, to Masius, London and New York, to handle its first account. Spending was estimated at $2 million to $5 million. Masius is part of the D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles unit of the B Com3 Group.
